meanings.definition: Lean or lie back in a relaxed position.
meanings.sent1: After a long day, she enjoys reclining on the sofa.
meanings.sent2: He was reclining on the beach chair, soaking up the sun.
meanings.sent3: The cat looked quite content reclining on the windowsill.
meanings.sent4: The tree branches were reclining gracefully in the wind.
meanings.sent5: The elderly man was reclining peacefully in his favorite armchair.

meanings.definition: The act of leaning or lying back in a relaxed position.
meanings.sent1: The reclining of the chair made it perfect for napping.
meanings.sent2: She found comfort in the reclining of the hammock.
meanings.sent3: The reclining of the office chair was a welcome break during work.
meanings.sent4: The reclining of the mountain against the sky was a breathtaking sight.
meanings.sent5: The reclining of the clouds in the sky painted a serene picture.
